caption.title: Percentage (%) dissolution of calcium oxalate by extracts.
caption.p: In the figure different lower case letters (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z, w, v) in the bars indicates significant differences among means (PË‚0.05). The blue and red colour bars indicate the aqueous and 70% ethanolic extracts, respectively. X-axis denotes the sample name and Y-axis denotes the percentage (%) dissolution of calcium oxalate by extracts.
